product_name: Badger Sport Sunscreen SPF 35 - 2.9 fl. oz.
long_description: Badger Sport sunscreen is the stuff you want when you're skiing, snowboarding, surfing, swimming, running, biking and hiking. The SPF 35 formula protects you wherever your adventures take you. Cream-based sunscreen provides broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays. Water resistant for up to 80 min.; for maintained protection, reapplication is recommended every 40 min. or after swimming, sweating and towel drying. Badger Sport sunscreen is biodegradable.
short_description: Badger Sport sunscreen is the stuff you want when you're skiing, snowboarding, surfing, swimming, running, biking and hiking. The SPF 35 formula protects you wherever your adventures take you.
